meanings.definition: The act of traveling from place to place.
meanings.sent1: Her itineracy around the city brought her to many new places.
meanings.sent2: The explorer's itineracy through the jungle was filled with excitement and discovery.
meanings.sent3: His itineracy to find the best pizza in town led him to try ten different pizzerias in one day.
meanings.sent4: The itineracy of the migrating birds across continents is a marvel of nature.
meanings.sent5: The itineracy of the circus performers from town to town captured the imagination of the children.

meanings.definition: The route or journey taken during travel.
meanings.sent1: The itineracy through the mountains was challenging but rewarding.
meanings.sent2: The itineracy along the coast offered breathtaking views of the ocean.
meanings.sent3: The itineracy of the lost hiker took him in circles until he found his way back.
meanings.sent4: The itineracy of the river winding through the valley was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The itineracy of the marathon route passed by many historic landmarks.
